title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 105 - Application by a Mortgage Broker for Inactive Status
content:

§ 105.4 - Application and undertaking, version 3

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 105

Statutory authority: Banking Law, § 12, art. 12-D; General

Regulations of the Banking Board, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
